channel.title: Development team-Stumped
channel.description:
Hello moparscape, I am with microFire development- The future of online gaming, and currently i am stumped, I have made many webclients before with no problem but do not know what the problem is now, I have my jar maker, and i select the output directory (where the jar will go to) and the input directory (folder with applet_sub1.java and client.java) the only two files you need for a webclient, now it jars and everything but when i double click it the loading circle will appear by my mouse, but after that nothing happens, the jar doesn't execute, open, or even give me an error! I have tried many different aspects of the maker, and many method's, and still, nothing if anyone can help that would be great :)
Regards, ~Schitzomniac (Microfire: Mod Steven)

item.title: Development team-Stumped
item.dc:creator: @Schitzomniac Schitzomniac
item.description:
@Schitzomniac wrote:

Hello moparscape,
I am with microFire development- The future of online gaming, and currently i am stumped,
I have made many webclients before with no problem but do not know what the problem is now,
I have my jar maker, and i select the output directory (where the jar will go to)
and the input directory (folder with applet_sub1.java and client.java) the only two files you need for
a webclient, now it jars and everything but when i double click it the loading circle will appear by my mouse,
but after that nothing happens, the jar doesn’t execute, open, or even give me an error! I have tried many
different aspects of the maker, and many method’s, and still, nothing if anyone can help that would be great

Regards,
~Schitzomniac (Microfire: Mod Steven)
